ygData.title: This forum is owned by TransFamily of Cleveland and offers support, discussions, and news for spouses and partners of transgend
ygData.description: This forum is owned by TransFamily of Cleveland and offers support, discussions, and news for spouses and partners of transgendered individuals. Subscriptions must be approved by TransFamily. You will need to write a brief description of your situation and a very short bio.
ygData.trailer:
Explore Spouse/Partner Resources on the TransFamily web site at http://www.transfamily.org/spouses.htm

The opinons expressed on this discussion list are the responsibility of the author, unless expressly announced as an official position of TransFamily Of Cleveland. As a member of a TransFamily email support group, you agree not to post or transmit any unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, profane, hateful, racially, ethnically or otherwise objectionable material of any kind, including, but not limited to, any material which encourages conduct that would constitute a criminal offense, violate the rights of others, or otherwise violate any applicable local, state, national or international law. You will be responsible for, and indemnify and hold harmless TransFamily Of Cleveland, its subsidiaries, divisions, affiliates, agents and representatives against, any claim arising from any material that you post or transmit.

You may visit the Yahoo! Groups web site to modify your subscriptions:http://groups.yahoo.com/mygroups

This will also let you change your subscription between digest and normal mode. You may also turn off/on email for vacation breaks.
ygData.name: TransFamilySpouses
